DOC.brief_summary: This study comparison different medical device infragenual dilatation .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Comparing Different Medical Devices Infragenual Dilatation
DOC.detailed_description: Dilatation recanalisation distal vein ( infragenual popliteal artery , tibiofibular trunc , posterior tibial artery , anterior tibial artery ) classical balloon dilatation cut balloon without stenting endovascular laser . This intervention happen ; duration intervention depend procedure original injury ( 30 - 120 minute ) .
DOC.criteria: Diabetes type I II diabetic angiopathy stage IIb IV ( Fontaine ) Atherosclerotic patient distal angiopathy stage IIb IV ( Fontaine ) Acute ischemia Multisegmentaric damage knee Sepsis : acute respiratory distress syndrome ( ARDS ) , Creactive protein ( CRP ) > 30 , white blood cell ( WBC ) > 25,000 Acute myocardial infarction ( AMI ) last 14 day Operative contraindication Life expectancy < 2 year Blue toe syndrome ( microembolisation )
